detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Hat in a soft, organic cotton textured weave with a frill trim at the front, elastication at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slim, ankle-length legs.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a lightly sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips.
Sports armband with a touchscreen window for smartphones, adjustable hook and loop fastening and earphone outlet at the bottom. Fits smartphones up to 7x14 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted, mirrored lenses.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.

Blouse in woven fabric with decorative gathers around the neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in airy viscose crêpe with side support and a silicone trim at the top. Opening and wide ties at the back, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and straight, wide legs with creases.
T-shirt in jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with a twisted trim at the neckline and sleeves, visible seams front and back and a rounded hem.

5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Coat in an Italian wool blend with a large detachable faux fur collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is partly recycled.

Weekend bag in nylon with two handles at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap in a contrasting colour. Zip at the top and three smaller inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Depth 21 cm, height 35 cm, width 42 cm.
Smartphone case in plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7.
Short jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs and a cut-off, frayed hem.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Two pairs of longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Trainers in imitation leather with glittery details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, patterned knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.

Longer blouse in lightweight, softly draping twill with a sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long-sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with cut-out sections front and back, a racer back and high-cut legs.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Soft inside.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric. Detachable hood with covered elastication, a zip and button band with press-studs down the front and raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hooded cardigan in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a diagonal zip down the front and long sleeves. Decorative seams front and back, and discreet pockets in the side seams.

Jacket in woven fabric with a small print motif at the top. Detachable, jersey-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Fingerless gloves in a soft, fine knit.
Lightly padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Oversized T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with dropped shoulders and embroidery with beads and sequins at the top.
Short skirt with a zip in one side and an adjustable belt with a metal fastener at the waist. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved dress in soft viscose jersey. Seam at the waist with a draped knot detail and a circular skirt. Unlined.
Short lace dress with a transparent yoke and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, seam at the waist and flared skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and half-string back.
Knee-length dress in a patterned, cotton crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a button at one side and a flounced seam at the hem. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Alice band covered in braided satin.
Pull-on shorts in stretch cotton twill with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Shorts in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
Cold shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with glittery seams at the sides, a ribbed trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fabric cap with sequined embroidery at the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Set with a top and pair of matching sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams. Top with a wide elastic hem and a small cut-out section between the racer back and hem. Sports tights with wide, covered elastication at the waist and inset side stripes.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Dress with a soft jersey bodice, zip at the back and cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a lined, flared, voluminous skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel that is elasticated at the top to provide space for the tummy.
Fully lined, long-sleeved swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and mesh details on the shoulders, sleeves and waist.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with real suede details. Narrow shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at both ends and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 18x24 cm.
Blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length, trumpet sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a lace trim at the hem.
Fully lined bikini top with a decorative tie detail at the front and underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back. Medium lift.

Bikini top in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top and a lined front with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Asymmetric seam under the bust, a wide elastic trim at the hem and mesh racer back with a chunky zip.

Long dress in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with an embroidered pattern. Wide shoulder straps, a smocked section at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with tiers for added width and volume. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a smocked stand-up collar, opening with small buttons at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine knit lambswool with a round, ribbed neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft rib knit with narrow, rib-knit trims on the short sides. Size 25x180 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
V-neck tunic in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
A pair of long, stylish metal earrings with hoops and rod-shaped pendants.
Mittens in a soft knit with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
